org.wiredwidgets.cow.webapp.client.bpm

Class Activities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wiredwidgets.cow.webapp.client.bpm.Activity
      • org.wiredwidgets.cow.webapp.client.bpm.Activities

  • public class Activities
extends Activity
    Activities are lists of Activity objects. They can be executed sequentially or in parallel. An Activities currently must have at least one Activity or it will not save.
    Author:
    JSTASIK
